languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, получена астропатическая передача с Даргонуса. Ахиллеас Скаландр сообщает о рейде ксеносов против торгового судна в системе Молчание Мер-Сегрит!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, получена астропатическая передача с Даргонуса. Ахиллеас Скаландр сообщает о потенциальном рейде ксеносов против торгового судна династии фон Валанциус".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, получена астропатическая передача с Даргонуса. Ахиллеас Скаландр сообщает о рейде ксеносов против торгового судна в системе Молчание Мер-Сегрит!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we've received an astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in Garthrafal's Calamity!"
"Lord Captain, we've received an astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in Garthrafal's Calamity!"
"Lord Captain, we have received an astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

"Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自达戈努斯的星语信息。阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德报告说，异形在梅赛格里特之默袭击了一艘商船！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自达戈努斯的星语信息。阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德报告说，异形在梅赛格里特之默袭击了一艘商船！”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje astropático de Dargonus. ¡Achilleas Scalander informa de una incursión xenos contra una nave mercante en el Silencio de Mer-Segrit!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje astropático de Dargonus. ¡Achilleas Scalander informa de una incursión xenos contra una nave mercante en el Silencio de Mer-Segrit!».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine astropathische Nachricht von Dargonus erhalten. Achilleas Scalander berichtet von einem Xenos-Angriff auf ein Handelsschiff in der Stille von Mer-Segrit!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message astropathique de Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander signale une attaque de xénos contre un navire marchand dans le Silence de Mer-Segrit ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message astropathique de Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander signale une attaque de xénos contre un navire marchand dans le Silence de Mer-Segrit ! »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスの感応通信官からメッセージが届きました。アキレアス・スカランダーより、メル・セグリットの沈黙の鎌（サイレンス）で商船が異種族の襲撃に遭ったとの報告です！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスの感応通信官からメッセージが届きました。アキレアス・スカランダーより、メル・セグリットの沈黙の鎌（サイレンス）で商船が異種族の襲撃に遭ったとの報告です！」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Dargonus'tan Astropatik bir mesaj aldık. Achilleas Scalander, zenoların Mer-Segrit'in Sessizliği'ndeki bir tüccar gemisine baskın düzenlediğini haber ediyor!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received an Astropathic message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander reports a xenos raid against a merchant ship in the Silence of Mer-Segrit!"
